bike.description: A-6 Quaternary phase alloy, custom butted, integrated head tube, top tube/seat tube gusset, down tube gusset, CNC'D hollow box section BB, water bottle mount

components.description: A-6 Quaternary phase alloy, custom butted w/ Four Bar linkage system 130m travel, Cold forged dropout with CNC'D disc mount and replaceable hanger, Sealed bearing pivots
Rock Shox Recon 351 Air w/ PopLoc Remote, 130mm Travel
Rock Shox Ario 2.2 Hydraulic damping w/LO
Shimano XT Hollow Tech II w/Integrated spindle, 22/32/44T
Schwalbe Nobby Nic UST 26 X 2.25" Foldable
Shimano XT Hydraulic Disc, 180mm Centerlock rotor
Ritchey Logic Zero Pro 1 1/8" Press Fit Integrated, 30mm spacers
